title: FOIA Request for Case-Related Materials - Brian Rodriguez-Sigala

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to formally request access to public records under the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA). Specifically, I am requesting any and all records and materials related to the case of

Suspect Name: Brian Rodriguez-Sigala
Description/Headline: Sparks man sentenced to 70 years in prison for 2021 murder
Link of the Article: https://mynews4.com/news/local/sparks-man-sentenced-to-70-years-in-prison-for-2021-murder-crime-safety
State: Sparks Nevada
Law Enforcement: Sparks Police Department

included but not limited to the following:
Documents:
Incident reports
Investigation reports
Officer statements
Witness statements
Any other relevant case files

Footage:
Body camera footage from officers on the scene
Dash camera footage
Police surveillance camera footage
Private/public surveillance footage from nearby locations
Any footage collected as evidence or during the investigation

Audio:
911 calls
Police radio communications
Any other audio recordings related to the case
Visual Media:
Crime scene photographs
Surveillance stills
Photographs taken during the investigation

Court Records:
Transcripts from court hearings or proceedings
Any video/audio footage from court hearings
Court orders or any other court-related documents

Please include any and all materials, regardless of format (digital or physical), including those not listed above that are related to the case in question.
Additionally, if this request has been sent to the wrong department or agency, I would appreciate it if you could provide guidance or contact information for the correct department or agency that handles such requests.

If any part of the request is denied or redacted, please provide a detailed explanation of the specific legal exemption that applies.
Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your timely response within the period mandated by FOIA.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

david yupa

title: Sally Mann artwork seized by police -- Judge Tim O'Hare

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: Sally Mann artwork seized by police -- Judge Tim O'Hare
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. Any communications sent to or from Tim O'Hare on or after December 1, 2024, which concerns or mentions the Modern Art Museum of Fort Worth, including (but not limited to) any communications containing any of the following terms: Museum, Sally, Mann, pornography, porn, indecent, decent, decency.

2. Any communications between Tim O'Hare and the Modern Art Museum of Fort Worth on or after December 1, 2024.

Please note that this request seeks public records wherever they may be found, including on devices or networks owned or operated by private parties. For example, if an employee uses a personal cell phone or social media account to conduct public business, records created, maintained, or held on the phone or account are public records subject to this request.

"Communications" means and includes emails, text messages, social media messages, letters, memoranda, calendar entries, chats, or any other form of one-to-one or one-to-many communication.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Adam Steinbaugh

title: Sally Mann artwork seized by police -- Fort Worth Police

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: Sally Mann artwork seized by police -- Fort Worth Police
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. Any police report, incident report, or similar narrative report concerning any photographs or art at the Modern Art Museum of Fort Worth. This is limited to reports generated on or after December 1, 2024.

2. Any complaint submitted to the Fort Worth Police Department concerning any photographs or art at the Modern Art Museum of Fort Worth. This is limited to complaints submitted on or after December 1, 2024.

3. Any audio of any 911 call concerning the Modern Art Museum of Fort Worth (3200 Darnell St, Fort Worth, TX 76107). This is limited to calls made on or after December 1, 2024.

4. Any body camera videos or recordings made at the Modern Art Museum of Fort Worth between January 4 - 8, 2025.

5. A copy of any warrant issued concerning the Modern Art Museum of Fort Worth on or after December 1, 2024.

6. A copy of any warrant application concerning the Modern Art Museum of Fort Worth made on or after December 1, 2024.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Adam Steinbaugh
